# ARGeoTrackingStatus

**Class**

The state, accuracy, and reason that are possible for geo-tracking’s current condition.

## Declaration

```swift
class ARGeoTrackingStatus
```

## Overview

Geo tracking requires coordination with the user at various phases of the geo-tracking lifecycle. To elicit the right user actions, an app needs to provide clear instructions to the user based on the current frame’s [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARFrame/geoTrackingStatus]:

- Geo-tracking [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARGeoTrackingStatus/state-swift.property] most notably regards the important process in which ARKit acquires a better understanding of the user’s geographic location and orientation than is possible with GPS and the compass heading alone. See [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARGeoTrackingStatus/State-swift.enum/localizing] for more information.
- Given a particular [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARGeoTrackingStatus/state-swift.property], the app needs to tailor its user messaging according to the [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARGeoTrackingStatus/stateReason-swift.property].
- An app may need to monitor [doc://com.apple.arkit/documentation/ARKit/ARGeoTrackingStatus/accuracy-swift.property] closely if it requires high-precision localization.

## Checking State

- **state**: A value that describes the session’s current geo-tracking state.
- **ARGeoTrackingStatus.State**: Values that are possible for the current state of geo-tracking.

## Determining the Reason

- **stateReason**: The reasons for the app’s geotracking status.
- **ARGeoTrackingStatus.StateReason**: The reasons for the app’s geotracking status.

## Judging Accuracy

- **accuracy**: The accuracy of geo tracking at the time the session captured the frame.
- **ARGeoTrackingStatus.Accuracy**: Values that are possible for the current accuracy of geo tracking.

## Assessing geo-tracking condition

- **geoTrackingStatus**: The session’s condition with respect to geographic tracking at the time the session captured the frame.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
